thread.title: BRIEF-Banner Corporation Q1 Earnings Per Share $0.89

title: BRIEF-Banner Corporation Q1 Earnings Per Share $0.89
text:
April 23, 2018 / 8:21 PM / Updated 7 minutes ago BRIEF-Banner Corporation Q1 Earnings Per Share $0.89 Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
April 23 (Reuters) - Banner Corp: 
* BANNER CORPORATION REPORTS FIRST QUARTER NET INCOME OF $28.8 MILLION, OR $0.89 PER DILUTED SHARE; HIGHLIGHTED BY STRONG DEPOSIT GROWTH, NET INTEREST MARGIN EXPANSION AND SOLID REVENUE GENERATION * Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.89 
* Q1 REVENUE $120.7 MILLION VERSUS I/B/E/S VIEW $97.1 MILLION 
* Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.73 â€” THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S 
* QTRLY NET INTEREST INCOME, BEFORE PROVISION FOR LOAN LOSSES, WAS $99.4 MILLION, VERSUS $94.9 MILLION IN Q1 A YEAR AGO Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
